flag.name: wxRB_GROUP
flag.description: Marks the beginning of a new group of radio buttons.

flag.name: wxRB_SINGLE
flag.description: In some circumstances, radio buttons that are not consecutive siblings trigger a hang bug in Windows (only). If this happens, add this style to mark the button as not belonging to a group, and implement the mutually-exclusive group behaviour yourself.

type.name: EVT_RADIOBUTTON
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_RADIOBUTTON_SELECTED event, when the radiobutton is clicked.
